title: Dover mesharim le-R[abbi]  (דובר מישרים לר ישראל)
author: Rabbi Israel (ר ישראל)
provenance: John Fell (1625-1686), Dean of Christ Church and Bishop of Oxford.
catalogue_identifier: Neubauer 2447. Malachi Beit-Arié, Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library: Supplement of Addenda and Corrigenda to Vol. I (A. Neubauer’s Catalogue) (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1994), no. 2447. George William Kitchin, Catalogus codicummss. qui in bibliotheca Ædis Christi apud Oxonienses adservantur (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1867), no. 197.
